channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- The Plus Addons for Elementor - Pro
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- The Plus Addons for Elementor - Pro

item.title: CVE-2021-24948|2024-08-03T19:49:14.124Z -- unknown -- the%20plus%20addons%20for%20elementor%20-%20pro
item.description: The Plus Addons for Elementor - Pro WordPress plugin before 5.0.7 does not validate the qvquery parameter of the tp_get_dl_post_info_ajax AJAX action, which could allow unauthenticated users to retrieve sensitive information, such as private and draft posts

item.title: CVE-2021-24949|2024-08-03T19:49:13.413Z -- unknown -- the%20plus%20addons%20for%20elementor%20-%20pro
item.description: The "WP Search Filters" widget of The Plus Addons for Elementor - Pro WordPress plugin before 5.0.7 does not sanitise and escape the option parameter before using it in a SQL statement, which could lead to SQL injection
